//Authored by: Amit Saharana, IIT Delhi
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int mod = 10007;
#define maxi 10000000
bool is_p[maxi + 1];
int ans[maxi + 1];
int
main ()
{
  //ios::sync_with_stdio (0);
  ans[2] = 1;
  for (int i = 2; i <= maxi; i++)
    {
      if (!is_p[i])
	{
	  if (i != 2)
	    ans[i] = (ans[i - 1] * 2) % mod;
	  if (i < 10000)
	    {
	      for (int j = i * i; j <= maxi; j += i)
		{
		  is_p[j] = 1;
		}
	    }
	}
      else
	{
	  ans[i] = ans[i - 1];
	}
    }

  int n;
  while (scanf("%d",&n)==1)
    {
      printf("%d\n",ans[n]);
    }
  return 0;
}
